item.title: Exploring Code and Laravel
item.description: One thing I really enjoy about any of Jeffrey Way's books or videos is how he emphasizes exploring code.   Laravel does have great docs but for me it has been best to first dig through the code. Coming from years of another PHP framework, digging though that code could still lead to not being certain about the answer just because it is was a bit different or more abstract than what I am seeing in Laravel or even Rails.
